Title: Conditions of Existence
Plot: When terrifying evidence suggests the Orphans are part of a sinister ongoing experiment, Sarah?s suspicions turn to Paul, Beth?s boyfriend. But her probing inadvertently triggers Paul?s own investigation, bringing him dangerously close to the truth. Meanwhile, paranoid Alison piles on a whole new level of complication.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence, drug use and sex scenes
